snippet: Regulatory changes announced by the Obama administration last week extend more benefits to same-sex couples, but they vary by state. Here’s a rundown.
lead_paragraph: Regulatory changes announced by the Obama administration last week extend more benefits to same-sex couples, but they vary by state. Here’s a rundown.

headline.main: A Guide to Changes in Federal Benefits for Same-Sex Couples

keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
